targets.expr:
max(capi_cluster_status_phase{name=~"$cluster", phase="Provisioned"} == 1 or
(capi_cluster_status_phase{name=~"$cluster", phase="Provisioning"} == 1) + 1 or
(capi_cluster_status_phase{name=~"$cluster", phase="Pending"} == 1) + 2 or
(capi_cluster_status_phase{name=~"$cluster", phase="Unknown"} == 1) + 3 or
(capi_cluster_status_phase{name=~"$cluster", phase="Deleting"} == 1) + 4 or
(capi_cluster_status_phase{name=~"$cluster", phase="Failed"} == 1) + 5) without (instance, pod)

max(capi_cluster_status_condition{name=~"$cluster", type="Ready", status="True"} == 1 or (capi_cluster_status_condition{name=~"$cluster", type="Ready", status="Unknown"} == 1) + 1 or (capi_cluster_status_condition{name=~"$cluster", type="Ready", status="False"} == 1) + 2) without (instance, pod)

max(capi_cluster_status_condition{name=~"$cluster", type="ControlPlaneInitialized", status="True"} == 1 or (capi_cluster_status_condition{name=~"$cluster", type="ControlPlaneInitialized", status="Unknown"} == 1) + 1 or (capi_cluster_status_condition{name=~"$cluster", type="ControlPlaneInitialized", status="False"} == 1) + 2) without (instance, pod)

max(capi_cluster_status_condition{name=~"$cluster", type="ControlPlaneReady", status="True"} == 1 or (capi_cluster_status_condition{name=~"$cluster", type="ControlPlaneReady", status="Unknown"} == 1) + 1 or (capi_cluster_status_condition{name=~"$cluster", type="ControlPlaneReady", status="False"} == 1) + 2) without (instance, pod)

max(capi_cluster_status_condition{name=~"$cluster", type="InfrastructureReady", status="True"} == 1 or (capi_cluster_status_condition{name=~"$cluster", type="InfrastructureReady", status="Unknown"} == 1) + 1 or (capi_cluster_status_condition{name=~"$cluster", type="InfrastructureReady", status="False"} == 1) + 2) without (instance, pod)

panels.title: MachineDeployment replicas with non True conditions
Control plane replicas with non True conditions

targets.expr: avg((capi_machine_status_condition{cluster_name=~"$cluster", type="NodeHealthy", status!="True"} == 1)  * on (name) group_left(node_name) capi_machine_status_noderef) by (cluster_name, node_name, status)
